author: cmsdoxy
body:
Why we need this pr?
- Generating UML diagrams
  - As requested by a user, with this pr, users will be able to get UML diagrams
- MACRO_EXPANSION flag
  - Please see the following thread to get more information: https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/workbook/257.html
- The source of the contact persons has been updated
  - I have updated the contact person source (it was cms tag collector before)
  - Contact info in the tree view (main pages of RefMans, e.g. https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/doxygen/CMSSW_7_5_1/doc/html/index.html) is coming from the new source: https://github.com/cmsdoxy/cmsdoxy/blob/master/CMSSWTagCollector/cmssw.py

Thanks.
title: Update reference manual scripts
